item.title: Srl includes
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

You said OR, not SOME.

The box breaker won’t work because of box update, I doubt RedXIIsFordCracker would work, and SSi2 is old.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl includes
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:7, topic:32656”][quote author=junkj link=topic=47277.msg580334#msg580334 date=1165471483]

{.include boxbreaker.txt}
{.include SSi2.txt}
{.include RedXIIsFordCracker.txt}

Aren’t SRL.

Didnt you read? i said some other stuff…
[/quote]

Yes but they don’t come with SRL and you said OR not SOME.[/quote]

But i said “some other stuff”

Read full topic

item.title: Srl includes
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“junkj, post:5, topic:32656”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=47277.msg580104#msg580104 date=1165468967]
{.include boxbreaker.txt}
{.include SSi2.txt}
{.include RedXIIsFordCracker.txt}

Aren’t SRL.
[/quote]

Didnt you read? i said some other stuff…[/quote]

Whoops, misunderstood.

Also, you don’t need Boxbreaker and stuff to run SRL, infact, they will conflict…

item.title: Srl includes
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

You just need to add {.include SRL\SRL.scar} thoguh for most scripts, make sure you have the latest version (3.5) www.villu-reborn.com Some scripts require extra features, such as PlayerForm.scar or a specific skill such as mining.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl includes
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

You must download SRL for this to work.
Download it here if you didnt:
Villu-Reborn.com

This is the main include: {.include srl/srl.scar}

Here are some of the includes…Or other stuff
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Extended/xMapWalk.Scar}
{.include boxbreaker.txt}
{.include SSi2.txt}
{.include RedXIIsFordCracker.txt}
{.include srl/srl/skill/cooking.scar}

Thats all i can find hope it useful

(please dont flame me!)

Thanks weibs…
